items.basicinformationcomments: All kWhs billed for the Heat Plus rate will be billed from October billing through the May billing.
items.description:
Energy Adjustment Clause - Rider No. 5
Applicable to Rates for Heat Plus Rate Code 8.
The energy adjustment clause shall provide for potential changes in the wholesale rate the Cooperative is charged for qualifying purchases of dual fuel heating service. Following any change in its wholesale power supplier's rates, the Cooperative shall determine the adjustment amount, if any, to be charged for each energy unit consumed under the dual fuel rate set forth by the Iowa Utilities Board. The calculation shall be:
EAC = CR - BR
*EAC is the energy cost adjustment to be used and will be rounded on a consistent basis to the nearest $0.0001 per kWh.
*CR is the Current wholesale rate charged by the Cooperative's power supplier applicable to qualifying dual fuel energy (kWh) sales.
*BR is the Base wholesale rate charged by the Cooperative's power supplier applicable to
qualifying dual fuel energy (kWh) sales. The base wholesale rate as determined for the adjusted Test Year ending December 2000 is $0.0210 per kWh.
items.name: Rate Code 8 - Heat Plus(separate meter)
